name: Curseblade Meera
description: Curseblade Meera is a Spirit and Summon in Elden Ring. Curseblade Meera summons an agile and powerful Curseblade
short_description: Curseblade Meera summons an agile and powerful Curseblade.
name: Archer Ashes
description: Spirits of archers who belonged to the Fallen Hawks, a band of soldiers that once explored the Eternal City.
short_description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell. Use to summon three archer spirits.
name: Nomad Ashes
description: A member of a tribe that was entombed in the earth so as to bury the maddening disease that followed them.
short_description: Ashen remains in which spirits yet dwell.
name: Warhawk Ashes
description: Spirit of a Stormveil warhawk, the talons of which have been sliced off so that razor-fine swords could be grafted in their place.
short_description: Use to summon the spirit of a warhawk.
name: Albinauric Ashes
description: A strapping duo of cartwheeling spirits who wield ripple swords and spew freezing breath.
short_description: Use to summon the spirits of two Albinaurics.
name: Giant Rat Ashes
description: The rat spirits appear at a distance from the summoner, swarming upon their victim to start the fight.
short_description: Use to summon the spirits of three giant rats.
name: Crystalian Ashes
description: Spirit that wields round crystalline blades, both big and small.
short_description: Use to summon the spirit of a Crystalian.
name: Lone Wolf Ashes
description: Spirits of wolves chased from their pack. They later encountered a nameless Tarnished, who welcomed them as hunting companions.
short_description: Use to summon the spirits of three lone wolves.
name: Page Ashes
description: Spirit of a page who traveled at the side of the noble he served.
short_description: Use to summon the spirit of a page.
name: Mausoleum Soldier Ashes
description: Spirits of five headless soldiers who confound foes by disappearing and reappearing at will.
short_description: Use to summon the spirits of five mausoleum soldiers.
